tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    device_name STRING NOT NULL,    device_type STRING NOT NULL,    location STRING,    configuration JSONB NOT NULL,    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW() );

CREATE TABLE device_settings (
  setting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  setting_name VARCHAR(100),
  setting_value VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smart_home_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    device_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE configurations (
    config_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_id UUID NOT NULL,
    config_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    config_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (config_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE settings (
    settings_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_id UUID NOT NULL,
    setting_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    setting_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (settings_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SmartHomeDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    device_location VARCHAR(100),
    device_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceConfigurations (
    config_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    config_name VARCHAR(255),
    config_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES SmartHomeDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceRoomMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES SmartHomeDevices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES RoomConfigurations(room_id)
);
